creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Soldiers of the Ukrainain explosive ordnance disposal team and the owner of their base reacting to the moment of blast of the unexposed ordnance found at their base after Russians shelled the area the day before. This team of the 241 brigade of the Territorial Defence Forces is based on the outskirts of Kharkiv. Only two people out of the whole squad knew de-mining craft before the war.
